summary: Senior technology executive with 25+ years of hands-on experience across software, hardware, manufacturing, and digital media delivery. Expert in system architecture, cloud and storage solutions, IPTV/OTT, broadcast, and large-scale media networks. Proven leader who builds global teams, transitions organizations to solution-selling models, and delivers complex, nationwide deployments. Recognized with Emmy and Clio awards for technological achievement and content delivery innovations.
skills: Systems for content creation and distribution

experience.title: Chief System Architect, SVP System Integration
experience.description: Responsibilities included building international integration and technical support organizations; led major RFP responses; transitioned the company from box selling to full solution selling with a global SI team; designed IPTV, Cable, OTT, DVB-T/T2, DVB-S/S2/DTH, MPLS, Mobile TV, Cloud Video and backup systems globally; oversaw design, deployment, and handover; opened 17 offices for system integration and support.

experience.title: Chief System Architect, Digital Media and Entertainment Group
experience.company: Telairity – Digital Media and Entertainment Group
experience.description: Led the global DME practice for enterprise clients, CSPs, and related markets; responsible for system designs and deployments of large-scale IPTV/OTT and digital media solutions; worked with clients such as Alcatel, Cisco, Scientific Atlanta, Yahoo, QUALCOMM, NTT, and others.

experience.title: CTO
experience.description: One of the original four founders; designed the entire IPTV/VOD/MobileTV delivery architecture, interactive UI, advertising system, and patented advertising program; led global developer program and evangelization for mobile TV; managed sales, partnerships, and content acquisition; company was sold.

experience.title: EVP Operations, EVP/GM of Engineering, Television Design Center
experience.description: Established China engineering, manufacturing, and operations for the world’s largest TV design and integration center in Shenzhen; built from scratch an operation for design, engineering, and manufacturing of LCD TVs and related devices; managed manufacturing, project and product management, and global accounts; led teams across China, Japan, and Korea.

experience.title: EVP Worldwide System Integration and Professional Services
experience.description: Created global integration, deployment, and field support operations for large enterprise clients, CSPs, digital media companies, and government programs; led MPEG-4/H.264 initiatives; expanded revenue base; managed global field staff.

experience.title: VP Global Professional Services, Integration and Technical Services
experience.description: Directed product development, field engineering, system engineering, and managed services; built global sales engineering and professional services teams; led MPEG-4/H.264 efforts and IP delivery integrations.

experience.title: Vice President System Integration and Professional Services
experience.description: Hired to establish Streaming21 as a leader in streaming media delivery; built a comprehensive SI and professional services capability; closed major contracts; created a Solutions Group to interface with strategic partners.

experience.title: Director of Digital Media Technology
experience.description: Developed vertical storage solutions for entertainment; secured Disney and other major clients; led growth of Fibre Channel SAN division; contributed to company acquisition by Bell Micro.

experience.title: Director of Technology, Creative Media Arts Division
experience.description: Built and re-designed storage and backup division for entertainment market; developed training programs; MRD tasks; supported entertainment vertical markets.

experience.title: CEO, Creative Director
experience.description: Directed post-production facility; grew company revenue and earned Emmy/Clio recognitions for documentary and commercial work.

experience.title: Vice President
experience.description: Led independent film production and distribution; contributed to revenue growth and eventual acquisition.

experience.title: President/CEO
experience.description: Built travel video content business; created first all-digital post-production facility; scaled to 250 employees and $175M annual revenue; earned Emmy/Clio recognition; company sold to Disney.

experience.title: Producer/Director
experience.description: In-house producer/director for regional, national, and international broadcast campaigns; won Clios.

experience.title: Executive Associate Producer
experience.description: Feature film packaging, cast/crew development, distribution agreements; negotiated ancillary rights and funding.

experience.title: First Assistant Director
experience.description: Staff director; directed regional/national ads; won Clio for United Airlines spot.
